sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This is an action to be used in Error handler of any flow, that should create an Incident to your assignment group when an error occurs for any flow execution.
Inputs: - Assignment Group - Caller - Error Code: Error Handler->Error Status-> Code - Error Message: Error Handler->Error Status-> Code
